## Import from dataset



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(mapview)

data <- read_csv('Yelp Academic Dataset - Select CA Cities & Businesses.csv')

```

ll as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r data}
mapview(data, xcol = "Longitude", ycol = "Latitude", crs = 4269, grid = FALSE)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r , echo=FALSE}
ggplot2(

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
